channel.title: Random Error
channel.description: I was simply adding trees & shops and when i went to compile my server it gave me this weird error any ideas?? [code]- Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code] I can obviously see that there are errors in the shophandler and idk how to fix it

item.title: Random Error
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I was simply adding trees & shops and when i went to compile my server it gave me this weird error any ideas?? - Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29)
I can obviously see that there are errors in the shophandler and idk how to fix it
